resources.string: "Scan QR code using new device Go to Settings > Additional Settings > Transfer Tap [I'm a recipient] to create a QR code"
"Method A 1. Install the Transfer app on your old device 2. Open the app and select [I'm a sender] 3. Scan the QR code with your old device"
"Method B Go to Settings > Additional Settings > Transfer Tap [I'm a sender]"
Scan QR code using new device
